messages.message: Is there a way to limit searches to a specific subset of documents? For example, can users search only within their own documents, slides, or spreadsheets rather than across all accessible files? Additionally, is there an option to search personal documents while excluding those shared with everyone?
I think this is the domain of chatbots/converse but @margaret.tomaszczuk to correct with proper Pov

to add a bit more context, I was thinking how great would it be if I could have my own "private work drive" where I could search something like -- aggregate all notes from any updates made regarding P&G for this past week.

Hey @madison.c! Great question and this actually does apply to Search.

• So you can refine to a specific drive to search over by using the connectors/drives dropdown pills, as in this screenshot
• However, for the specific scenario you are mentioning where you want to search _your own account_ -- that's something we should be able to explore configuring for Instabase in late Q1/early Q2 when we have proper permissions enforcement deployed (EPD-3652 (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-3652))... until we have that we are only mounting public drives to be safe!
